doc.title: A Farmer's Imitation of Ching Ling Foo
doc.plot: An old farmer appears, making an awkward bow, and holds up a large quilt, showing that there is nothing behind it. He then spreads it out, and when he draws it away a bicycle-bloomer girl is seen. They both hold it up again, and when they take it away, a donkey is seen. The next time they hold it up, they produce three girls.
